query:
WITH rav AS (
                SELECT 
                    rav -> 'message' ->> 'timestamp_ns' AS timestamp_ns 
                FROM 
                    scalar_tap_latest_ravs 
                WHERE 
                    allocation_id = $1 
                    AND sender_address = $2
            ) 
            SELECT 
                COUNT(*), 
                MAX(id), 
                SUM(value) 
            FROM 
                scalar_tap_receipts 
            WHERE 
                allocation_id = $1 
                AND sender_address = $2 
                AND CASE WHEN (
                    SELECT 
                        timestamp_ns :: NUMERIC 
                    FROM 
                        rav
                ) IS NOT NULL THEN timestamp_ns > (
                    SELECT 
                        timestamp_ns :: NUMERIC 
                    FROM 
                        rav
                ) ELSE TRUE END
